content: from the crown towards the brim stitches will then be picked up going upwards towards the crown on the second needle with one us 3 dpn pick up and knit 12 stitches alongside one of the decrease lines of the hat approx 4 stitches from the center bind off with second dpn pick up and knit 12 stitches up the other side of the decrease line see photo below knit 3 rounds decrease for top of ear on each needle k2tog knit until last two stitches k2tog 4 sts reduced repeat until 4 stitches remain on each needle 8 total bind off and mattress stitch opening closed repeat for other ear on the matching decrease line on the opposite side of the hat weave in ends itty bitty bear cubs preemie hat pattern ó carolyn ingram pattern may not be sold page 3
